com.quorum.tessera.config.keys

Interface KeyEncryptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyEncryptorImpl

    public interface KeyEncryptor
    Provides key encryption and decryption for private keys into the representation expected by a private key file

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SALTLENGTH 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PrivateKey decryptPrivateKey(PrivateKeyData privateKeyConfig, String password)
      Decrypts a private key using the password and information provided by the given JSON object.
      PrivateKeyData encryptPrivateKey(PrivateKey privateKey, String password, ArgonOptions argonOptions)
      Encrypts a private key using the given password and returns a JSON object that can be interpreted when decrypting

    • Field Detail

      • SALTLENGTH

        static final int SALTLENGTH
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • encryptPrivateKey

        PrivateKeyData encryptPrivateKey(PrivateKey privateKey,
                                 String password,
                                 ArgonOptions argonOptions)
        Encrypts a private key using the given password and returns a JSON object that can be interpreted when decrypting
        Parameters:
        privateKey - the key to encrypt
        password - the password to encrypt the key with
        Returns:
        the configuration that can be used to decrypt the private key

      • decryptPrivateKey

        PrivateKey decryptPrivateKey(PrivateKeyData privateKeyConfig,
                             String password)
        Decrypts a private key using the password and information provided by the given JSON object. What information the object contains is up to the implementor.
        Parameters:
        privateKeyConfig - the configuration used to decrypt the private key
        password - the password that should be used to decrypt the private key
        Returns:
        the decrypted private key
